languages.text: {n}Соломон привлекает ваше внимание скупым жестом.{/n} "Я поведу отряд Дельта-Кси по нижней части палубы — там узкие пространства, трубы с прометием, технические помещения, где противних хорошо ориентируется. Эту сложную территорию мы берем на себя. Ваш отряд, позывной Вита-Тета, идет поверху. Цель — прорваться к лифту. Вольного Торговца прошу особо — под пули не подставляйтесь, напрасно не рискуйте. Мы не имеем права вас потерять. После зачистки палубы встречаемся для перегруппировки и штурма".

traits.locale_text: {n}Арбитесы прислонились к стене с оружием наготове, ожидая приказ командира. Соломон привлекает ваше внимание скупым жестом.{/n} "Я поведу отряд по нижней палубе и возьму огонь на себя. Вольный Торговец — на вас верхняя палуба. Прорывайтесь к мостику, пока мы отвлекаем основные силы".

languages.text: {n}With the sparest of movements, Solomorne attracts your attention.{/n} "I will lead Delta-Xi squad along the lower deck, through the tight passageways, promethium pipework, and service areas where the enemy is most at home. We will take that difficult ground. Your squad — call sign Rho-Theta — will proceed along the upper deck. The objective is to reach the elevator. Rogue Trader, I request that you personally do not put yourself in the line of fire or take any unnecessary risks — we cannot afford to lose you. Once the deck sweep is complete, we'll rendezvous to regroup and launch the assault."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон привлекает ваше внимание скупым жестом.{/n} "Я поведу отряд Дельта-Кси по нижней части палубы — там узкие пространства, трубы с прометием, технические помещения, где противних хорошо ориентируется. Эту сложную территорию мы берем на себя. Ваш отряд, позывной Вита-Тета, идет поверху. Цель — прорваться к лифту. Вольного Торговца прошу особо — под пули не подставляйтесь, напрасно не рискуйте. Мы не имеем права вас потерять. После зачистки палубы встречаемся для перегруппировки и штурма".

languages.text: {n}Con un movimiento apenas perceptible, Solomorne llama tu atención.{/n} «Yo guiaré al escuadrón Delta-Xi a la cubierta inferior, por los pasadizos estrechos, los conductos de prometio y las zonas de servicio donde el enemigo se siente como en casa. Nos ocuparemos del terreno difícil. Su escuadrón, código Ro-Zeta, continuará por la cubierta superior. El objetivo es llegar al ascensor. Comerciante Independiente solicito que no entre en la línea de tiro ni corra riesgos innecesarios. No podemos perderle. Cuando hayamos barrido ambas cubiertas, nos reagruparemos para iniciar el asalto».
languages.original_text: {n}With the sparest of movements, Solomorne attracts your attention.{/n} "I will lead Delta-Xi squad along the lower deck, through the tight passageways, promethium pipework, and service areas where the enemy is most at home. We will take that difficult ground. Your squad — call sign Rho-Theta — will proceed along the upper deck. The objective is to reach the elevator. Once the deck sweep is complete, we'll rendezvous to regroup and launch the assault."

Nos ocuparemos del terreno difícil. Su escuadrón, código Ro-Zeta, continuará por la cubierta superior. El objetivo es llegar al ascensor. Cuando hayamos barrido ambas cubiertas, nos reagruparemos para iniciar el asalto».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙做了个简短的动作，吸引了你的注意力。{/n}“我准备带领德尔塔小队沿着底层甲板前进，穿过狭窄的通道和钷素管道，抵达敌人最密集的工作区，占领甲板。在此期间，你的西塔小队负责沿着上层甲板前进，朝电梯的方向进发。行商浪人，我请求你千万不要亲自冲到前线，也不要冒任何不必要的风险，我们绝对不能失去你。等甲板清理完毕之后，我们会重新集结，发起最后的总攻。”
languages.original_text: {n}With the sparest of movements, Solomorne attracts your attention.{/n} "I will lead Delta-Xi squad along the lower deck, through the tight passageways, promethium pipework, and service areas where the enemy is most at home. We will take that difficult ground. Your squad — call sign Rho-Theta — will proceed along the upper deck. The objective is to reach the elevator. Rogue Trader, I request that you personally do not put yourself in the line of fire or take any unnecessary risks — we cannot afford to lose you. Once the deck sweep is complete, we'll rendezvous to regroup and launch the assault."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙做了个简短的动作，吸引了你的注意力。{/n}“我准备带领德尔塔小队沿着底层甲板前进，穿过狭窄的通道和钷素管道，抵达敌人最密集的工作区，占领甲板。在此期间，你的西塔小队负责沿着上层甲板前进，朝电梯的方向进发。行商浪人，我请求你千万不要亲自冲到前线，也不要冒任何不必要的风险，我们绝对不能失去你。等甲板清理完毕之后，我们会重新集结，发起最后的总攻。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne attire votre attention d'un geste quasiment imperceptible.{/n} « Je vais emmener l'escouade Delta-Xi à l'assaut du pont inférieur, à travers les couloirs étroits, les conduits de prométhium et les zones de service, là où l'ennemi est le plus à l'aise. Nous nous chargerons de prendre ce terrain difficile. Quant à votre escouade, nom de code Rho-Thêta, elle s'attaquera au pont supérieur, l'objectif étant d'atteindre l'ascenseur. {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, je vous demanderai de ne pas vous placer dans la ligne de tir et de ne pas prendre de risques inutiles. Nous ne pouvons pas nous permettre de vous perdre. Une fois le pont dégagé, nous nous regrouperons avant de passer à l'attaque. »
languages.original_text: {n}With the sparest of movements, Solomorne attracts your attention.{/n} "I will lead Delta-Xi squad along the lower deck, through the tight passageways, promethium pipework, and service areas where the enemy is most at home. We will take that difficult ground. Your squad — call sign Rho-Theta — will proceed along the upper deck. The objective is to reach the elevator. Rogue Trader, I request that you personally do not put yourself in the line of fire or take any unnecessary risks — we cannot afford to lose you. Once the deck sweep is complete, we'll rendezvous to regroup and launch the assault."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne attire votre attention d'un geste quasiment imperceptible.{/n} « Je vais emmener l'escouade Delta-Xi à l'assaut du pont inférieur, à travers les couloirs étroits, les conduits de prométhium et les zones de service, là où l'ennemi est le plus à l'aise. Nous nous chargerons de prendre ce terrain difficile. Quant à votre escouade, nom de code Rho-Thêta, elle s'attaquera au pont supérieur, l'objectif étant d'atteindre l'ascenseur. {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, je vous demanderai de ne pas vous placer dans la ligne de tir et de ne pas prendre de risques inutiles. Nous ne pouvons pas nous permettre de vous perdre. Une fois le pont dégagé, nous nous regrouperons avant de passer à l'attaque. »

languages.text: {n}最小限の動きで、ソロモーンはあなたの注意を引く。{/n}「私が『デルタ-Xi』チームを引き連れ、下層デッキで敵の注意をそらして攻撃を引きつけます。あなたのチーム、呼出符号『ローシータ』は、上層デッキに沿って進んでください。目的はエレベーターに到達することです。ローグトレーダー、お願いですから自ら進んで危険に飛び込んだり、無用なリスクを負わないでください。私たちはあなたを失うわけにはいかないんです。デッキの掃討が完了したら合流し、グループを再編して襲撃を開始します」
languages.original_text: {n}With the sparest of movements, Solomorne attracts your attention.{/n} "I will lead Delta-Xi squad along the lower deck. We'll distract the enemy and draw fire on ourselves. Your squad — call sign Rho-Theta — will proceed along the upper deck. The objective is to reach the elevator. Rogue Trader, I request that you personally do not put yourself in the line of fire and do not take unnecessary risks — we cannot lose you. Once the deck sweep is complete, we'll rendezvous to regroup and launch the assault."

traits.locale_text: {n}最小限の動きで、ソロモーンはあなたの注意を引く。{/n}「私が『デルタ-Xi』チームを引き連れ、下層デッキで敵の注意をそらして攻撃を引きつけます。あなたのチーム、呼出符号『ローシータ』は、上層デッキに沿って進んでください。目的はエレベーターに到達することです。ローグトレーダー、お願いですから自ら進んで危険に飛び込んだり、無用なリスクを負わないでください。私たちはあなたを失うわけにはいかないんです。デッキの掃討が完了したら合流し、グループを再編して襲撃を開始します」

languages.text: {n}En ufak hareketi, Solomorne'un dikkatini çekmesine yol açıyor.{/n} "Alt güvertede Delta-Hi takımına önderlik edip adamlarımı düşmanın en rahat olduğu dar geçitlerden, prometyum boru hatlarından ve servis bölgelerinden geçireceğim. Zorlu alanlar ele geçireceğiz. Siz de Ro-Thita kod adlı takımınızla üst güvertede ilerleyeceksiniz. Amaç, asansöre ulaşmak. Hür Tacir, bizzat ateş hattına girmeyin veya gereksiz risk almayın. Sizi kaybetmeyi göze alamayız. Güverte temizlendiğinde toparlanmak ve taarruzu başlatmak üzere buluşacağız."
languages.original_text: {n}With the sparest of movements, Solomorne attracts your attention.{/n} "I will lead Delta-Xi squad along the lower deck, through the tight passageways, promethium pipework, and service areas where the enemy is most at home. We will take that difficult ground. Your squad — call sign Rho-Theta — will proceed along the upper deck. The objective is to reach the elevator. Rogue Trader, I request that you personally do not put yourself in the line of fire or take any unnecessary risks — we cannot afford to lose you. Once the deck sweep is complete, we'll rendezvous to regroup and launch the assault."

traits.locale_text: {n}En ufak hareketi, Solomorne'un dikkatini çekmesine yol açıyor.{/n} "Alt güvertede Delta-Hi takımına önderlik edip adamlarımı düşmanın en rahat olduğu dar geçitlerden, prometyum boru hatlarından ve servis bölgelerinden geçireceğim. Zorlu alanlar ele geçireceğiz. Siz de Ro-Thita kod adlı takımınızla üst güvertede ilerleyeceksiniz. Amaç, asansöre ulaşmak. Hür Tacir, bizzat ateş hattına girmeyin veya gereksiz risk almayın. Sizi kaybetmeyi göze alamayız. Güverte temizlendiğinde toparlanmak ve taarruzu başlatmak üzere buluşacağız."

languages.text: {n}Mit kaum merklichen Bewegungen zieht Solomorne deine Aufmerksamkeit auf sich.{/n} "Ich werde Delta-Xi durch das untere Deck führen, durch die schmalen Gänge, die Promethiumleitungen und die Wartungsbereiche, in denen die meisten Gegner lauern. Wir werden dieses schwierige Gelände erobern. Euer Team – Rufzeichen Rho-Theta – rückt auf dem oberen Deck vor. Euer Ziel ist der Aufzug. {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, ich bitte Euch, selbst nicht in die Schusslinie zu treten und von unnötigen Risiken abzusehen ... wir können es uns nicht leisten, Euch zu verlieren. Sobald wir das Deck geräumt haben, sammeln wir uns und beginnen mit dem Angriff."
languages.original_text: {n}With the sparest of movements, Solomorne attracts your attention.{/n} "I will lead Delta-Xi squad along the lower deck, through the tight passageways, promethium pipework, and service areas where the enemy is most at home. We will take that difficult ground. Your squad — call sign Rho-Theta — will proceed along the upper deck. The objective is to reach the elevator. Rogue Trader, I request that you personally do not put yourself in the line of fire or take any unnecessary risks — we cannot afford to lose you. Once the deck sweep is complete, we'll rendezvous to regroup and launch the assault."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit kaum merklichen Bewegungen zieht Solomorne deine Aufmerksamkeit auf sich.{/n} "Ich werde Delta-Xi durch das untere Deck führen, durch die schmalen Gänge, die Promethiumleitungen und die Wartungsbereiche, in denen die meisten Gegner lauern. Wir werden dieses schwierige Gelände erobern. Euer Team – Rufzeichen Rho-Theta – rückt auf dem oberen Deck vor. Euer Ziel ist der Aufzug. {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, ich bitte Euch, selbst nicht in die Schusslinie zu treten und von unnötigen Risiken abzusehen ... wir können es uns nicht leisten, Euch zu verlieren. Sobald wir das Deck geräumt haben, sammeln wir uns und beginnen mit dem Angriff."
